cards.alt: Bid On This Twin-Turbo Coyote-Powered 1962 Ford Galaxie 500XL Restomod
Bid On This Twin-Turbo Coyote-Powered 1962 Ford Galaxie 500XL Restomod
Bid On This Twin-Turbo Coyote-Powered 1962 Ford Galaxie 500XL

sections: is pleased to offer this stunning yet powerful
from the Gary Gregory Collection. This modern-powered classic will hit the Fall Carlisle auction stage in Carlisle, Pennsylvania, on the weekend of October 3-4, 2019.
What appears to be an insanely clean

has something far more sinister lurking below its hood. Imagine parking at the car show, popping the hood, and gauging the reactions of unsuspecting bystanders when they realize just what kind of heat this ole girl is packin’.

is a modern Coyote 5.0L V8 mated to a pair of twin turbochargers. A 6R80 automatic transmission with a first-generation Lokar electronic sport mode shifter sends power down to the rear wheels. For added performance and rumble, a 3-inch stainless steel exhaust was added.

When a car is capable of this much power, a heavy-duty suspension is required to back it up. To keep this beast in check is a RideTech rear suspension along with QA1 coilover shocks and tubular control arms. Electric power steering makes turning a breeze and stopping is provided by 13-inch Wilwood brakes. A set of Billet Specialty Heritage wheels wrapped with Nitto rubber grace the exterior. Behind the Galaxie’s doors is a full OEM interior covered in burgundy leather and complete with Vintage air conditioning.
The build started with an all-original 17,000-mile

. From there, this restomod was taken to a whole new level.  To accommodate the large modern drivetrain, the crossmember, inner fenders, control arms, wheel arches, firewall were all modified. In addition, the rear quarters were also fabricated with raised wheel arches. Its sleek body is slathered in a mesmerizing Axalta Charcoal paint. This car took home the Good Guys first place award.
If this is the modern-powered classic you’ve been searching for, register to bid here for the fall Carlisle Auction here. You’re not going to want to miss out on this one-of-a-kind

. Promo Code and Discount (in dollars) for Carlisle Events Fall Admission Code is CE1 (all caps) and discount is $5 for single day admission and $10 off multi-day admission. Promo Code and Discount (in dollars) for Bidder Registration CA1 and it’s $50 savings.
